JOB DESCRIPTION:
We are seeking a highly skilled Senior ASP. NET/ C# developer with a strong background in building scalable,  predictable,  high- quality and high- performance web applications on the Microsoft technology stack. 

Roles and Responsibilities 

As a Senior Developer,  the person will be responsible for designing and coding our new product offering and is expected to work and deliver on the basis of technical/ functional specification provided.  The person is also expected to mentor,  train and monitor any developers assigned to him/ her. 

3 + years experience with ASP. NET/ C#.  (Live Projects) 2 + years working with SQL Server (2005 onwards).  (Live Projects) 2 + years working with Seagate Crystal Reports (8. 00 onwards).  (Live Projects) Working knowledge of VB 6. 00 Good understanding of OOPS and RDBMS concepts Ability to adapt quickly to an existing,  complex environment.  Ability to quickly learn new concepts and softwares when required
